pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.1.11: “Ridge beam” renders piṭṭhivaṁsa. Sp 2.280: Piṭṭhivaṁsaṁ atikkamitvāti iminā majjhātikkamaṁ dasseti; “Piṭṭhivaṁsaṁ atikkamitvā: by this going beyond the middle is shown.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc43:2.2.1: “Bedroom” renders sayanighara, literally, “house for sleeping”. Kkh-pṭ: Sayanigharanti sayanīyagharaṁ, vāsagehanti attho, “Bedroom: a house to be slept in. The meaning is a house for living in.”
